original_text: Jacob was very frightened and upset when he heard this. So he separated his people into two groups. He also separated his animals.
korean_text: 야곱이 심히 두렵고 답답하여 자기와 함께 한 동행자와 양과 소와 낙타를 두 떼로 나누고

sentences.original_text: Jacob was very frightened and upset
So he separated his people into two groups
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 자기 백성을 두 그룹으로 나누었습니다
